name: Browser Automation Agent
description: An intelligent browser automation agent with vision AI that can navigate websites, take screenshots, analyze and describe visual content, extract information, and perform complex web-based tasks. Uses Qwen3-VL vision model to see and describe web pages - no separate image analysis needed.

endpoints.description: Executes a browser automation task with vision capabilities. Can navigate, interact, extract data, and take screenshots.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: The task description for the browser agent (e.g., 'Navigate to github.com/browser-use and extract the repository stars count').

parameters.name: extract_data
parameters.description: Whether to extract structured data from the page (default: False).
